snippet: A ballot measure’s failure could hobble Gov. Jerry Brown, whose hoped-for legacy had been wresting his state from a fiscal crisis.
abstract: California Gov Jerry Brown's Proposition 30, which would raise taxes to head off as much as $6 billion in public education spending cuts, is struggling in polls; he is in high gear to save measure, as its failure could hobble him and his hoped-for legacy to save state from fiscal crisis.
lead_paragraph: A ballot measure’s failure could hobble Gov. Jerry Brown, whose hoped-for legacy had been wresting his state from a fiscal crisis.

headline.seo: Jerry Brown Throws Himself Into Prop. 30 Vote
headline.main: California’s Governor Is in High Gear Over a Tax Initiative
headline.print_headline: Governor in High Gear Over a Tax Initiative
